metadata.name: meridian_stablecoin
metadata.description: Stablecoin with Token-2022 Extensions - Compliant Electronic Payment Method

instructions.name: burn
docs: Burn stablecoin tokens for fiat redemption

accounts.name: holder_token_account
docs: Holder's token account to burn from

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initialize the stablecoin mint with Token-2022 extensions

accounts.name: mint
docs: Token-2022 mint with extensions configured based on preset.

instructions.name: mint
docs: Mint stablecoin tokens to a verified recipient

accounts.name: recipient_token_account
docs: Recipient token account (must be whitelisted via transfer hook)

instructions.name: register_issuer
docs: Register an authorized issuer (Trust Bank, Distributor, etc.)

instructions.name: seize
docs: Seize tokens from a frozen account via permanent delegate (SSS-2 only)
Fails gracefully if permanent delegate was not enabled during initialization.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority performing the seize (must be master authority or seizer role)

accounts.name: source
docs: The frozen account to seize tokens from

accounts.name: treasury
docs: Treasury account to receive seized tokens

instructions.name: transfer
docs: Transfer stablecoin with compliance check via transfer hook

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized: caller is not the authority

errors.name: CollateralRatioViolation
errors.msg: Collateral ratio violation: must maintain 100% backing

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Invalid amount: must be greater than zero

errors.name: ComplianceCheckFailed
errors.msg: Transfer not allowed: compliance check failed

errors.name: PermanentDelegateNotEnabled
errors.msg: Permanent delegate not enabled: initialize with SSS-2 preset

errors.name: TreasuryNotConfigured
errors.msg: Treasury not configured: set treasury before seizing

errors.name: ComplianceModuleNotEnabled
errors.msg: Compliance module not enabled for this preset

errors.name: AccountNotFrozen
errors.msg: Account must be frozen before seize

errors.name: InvalidRole
errors.msg: Caller does not have the required role

fields.name: redemption_info
docs: Bank account info for fiat redemption (encrypted)

fields.name: total_collateral
docs: Total fiat collateral held (in smallest unit)

fields.name: treasury
docs: Treasury for seized tokens (required for SSS-2)

fields.name: default_account_frozen
docs: New accounts start frozen (auto-enabled for SSS-2)

fields.name: transfer_hook_program
docs: Transfer hook program for KYC/AML compliance

fields.name: total_collateral
docs: Total fiat collateral backing (in smallest unit)

fields.name: collateral_ratio_bps
docs: For trust-type stablecoin, should always be >= 10000

fields.name: preset
docs: Which preset was used to initialize this stablecoin

fields.name: enable_permanent_delegate
docs: SSS-2: Enable permanent delegate (required for seize)

fields.name: enable_transfer_hook
docs: SSS-2: Enable transfer hook for compliance checks

fields.name: default_account_frozen
docs: SSS-2: New token accounts start frozen (must be thawed after KYC)

fields.name: reference
docs: Bank transfer reference for audit trail

types.name: RoleConfig
docs: Role-based access control for stablecoin operations

fields.name: master_authority
docs: Master authority â€” can assign all other roles

fields.name: minter
docs: Minter role (can mint tokens, subject to quotas)

fields.name: seizer
docs: Seizer role (SSS-2: can seize via permanent delegate)

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount to seize (0 = seize entire balance)

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount to add (positive) or remove (negative expressed as separate flag)
